00036 namespace loos {
00037 
00039 
00060   class TinkerArc : public Trajectory {
00061   public:
00062     explicit TinkerArc(const std::string& s) : Trajectory(s), _natoms(0), _nframes(0),
00063                                                current_index(0), at_end(false) { init(); }
00064     explicit TinkerArc(const char *p) : Trajectory(p), _natoms(0),
00065                                         _nframes(0), current_index(0), at_end(false) { init(); }
00066 
00067     explicit TinkerArc(std::iostream& is) : Trajectory(is), _natoms(0),
00068                                         _nframes(0), current_index(0), at_end(false) { init(); }
00069 
00070     virtual uint nframes(void) const { return(_nframes); }
00071     virtual uint natoms(void) const { return(_natoms); }
00072     virtual std::vector<GCoord> coords(void);
00073     virtual void updateGroupCoords(AtomicGroup& g) { g.copyCoordinates(frame); }
00074 
00075     virtual bool hasPeriodicBox(void) const { return(frame.isPeriodic()); }
00076     virtual GCoord periodicBox(void) const { return(frame.periodicBox()); }
00077 
00078     virtual float timestep(void) const { return(0.001); }
00079 
00081 
00084     TinkerXYZ currentFrame(void) const { return(frame); }
00085 
00086   private:
00087     void init(void);
00088     virtual void rewindImpl(void) { ifs()->clear(); ifs()->seekg(0); current_index = 0; at_end = false; }
00089     virtual void seekNextFrameImpl(void);
00090     virtual void seekFrameImpl(const uint);
00091     virtual bool parseFrame(void);
00092 
00093 
00094   private:
00095     uint _natoms, _nframes;
00096     uint current_index;
00097     bool at_end;
00098     TinkerXYZ frame;
00099     std::vector<long> indices;
00100   };

00103 }
